content:
Hi, Go to Settings > General> Reading &Display > Automatically mark messages as read and deselect it!

Enjoy!
creator: shopov.bogomil

content:
Hi, Could you please see if some of the ideas here could help you: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/cannot-receive-messages

if not, please provide more details and error messages! Have a nice day!
